title: The Masked Singer
overview: The best craziest show in the world: In The Masked Singer, ten stars from all walks of life dress in oversized, elaborate costumes that make them completely unrecognizable. The identity of celebrity undercover singers can only be speculated. The spectators vote for their favorites. At the masked celebrity with the least votes, the secret is revealed at the end of the show: Which star hides under the mask?
